tasks.description: Icon changes to primary color when card is selected
tasks.details: When a mood or ambient card is selected, change the icon color from text-muted-foreground to text-primary. Add this to the className of the icon div based on selection state.
Increase the shadow on selected cards from shadow-md to shadow-lg and make the primary color glow more visible with shadow-primary/30 instead of /20.
Add a subtle gradient to selected cards using bg-gradient-to-br from-primary/10 to-primary/20 instead of flat bg-primary/15.
Add focus:ring-2 focus:ring-primary focus:ring-offset-2 focus:outline-none to all mood and ambient card buttons for keyboard navigation.
Add hover:scale-[1.02] to mood and ambient cards. Ensure transform is in the className for the transition to work smoothly.
Add transition-colors duration-300 to the icon div so the color change from muted to primary is animated.

tasks.description: Lift effect with shadow on hover
tasks.details: Add hover:shadow-lg hover:-translate-y-0.5 to cards for a subtle lift effect when hovering. Combine with existing hover states.

tasks.description: Active state with subtle scale down
tasks.details: Add active:scale-[0.98] to cards for tactile feedback when clicking/tapping.
Find the 'choose a mood' and 'choose an ambient' labels and make them more distinctive with text-sm font-semibold uppercase tracking-wider text-muted-foreground/80.

tasks.description: Better spacing between mood and ambient sections
tasks.details: Increase the gap between the mood section and ambient section. Look for the space-y or gap classes and increase from current value to space-y-8 or similar.
Add a subtle divider between mood and ambient sections using a div with className 'h-px bg-border/30 my-6' or similar.
Ensure the card styles for moods and ambients are consistent. Check that both use the same padding, border radius, transitions, and hover states.
Ensure all cards have minimum 44x44px touch targets. Check padding and sizing work well on mobile viewports (sm: breakpoint).
Test that hover states, transitions, and layouts work well on larger screens (md: and lg: breakpoints).
Ensure all transitions use GPU-accelerated properties (transform, opacity). Avoid animating layout properties like width/height.
Review all changes, ensure consistency, remove any redundant classes, and verify the overall visual experience matches the plan goals.
